mapper.sql:
from infrMember a left join infrMemberAddress b on b.ifmaDelNy = 0 and b.ifmaDefaultNy = 1 and b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMembereMail d on d.ifmeDelNy = 0 and d.ifmeDefaultNy = 1 and d.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMemberNationality g on g.ifmnDefaultNy = 1 and g.ifmnDelNy = 0 and g.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrmemberphone h on h.ifmpDelNy = 0 and h.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 and h.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq and h.ifmpDeviceCd = 25 and h.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 where 1=1
AND a.ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND concat(b.ifmaAddress1," ",b.ifmaAddress2) LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND h.ifmpNumber LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.ifmmDob BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}
AND a.ifmmDelNy = 0 AND a.ifmmDelNy = 1
mapper.select:
select a.ifmmseq , a.ifmmName , a.ifmmId , a.ifmmGenderCd , concat("[",b.ifmaZipcode,"] ",b.ifmaAddress1," ",b.ifmaAddress2) as ifmaAddress , (select concat(substring(ifmpNumber,1,3),"-",substring(ifmpNumber,4,4),"-",substring(ifmpNumber,8,4)) from infrmemberphone where ifmpDeviceCd = 25 and ifmpDefaultNy = 1 and a.ifmmSeq = ifmmSeq) as ifmpNumberDash , (select ifnaName from infrNationality where ifnaSeq = g.ifnaSeq) as ifnaName , h.ifmpNumber , d.ifmeEmailFull
limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}

select a.ifmmseq , a.ifmmName , a.ifmmId , (select ifcdName from infrCode where a.ifmmGenderCd = ifcdSeq) as ifmmGender , a.ifmmDob , (select ifcdName from infrCode where a.ifmmSavedCd = ifcdSeq) as ifmmSaved , a.ifmmSavedCd , (select ifcdName from infrCode where a.ifmmMarriageCd = ifcdSeq) as ifmmMarriage , a.ifmmMarriageCd , a.ifmmMarriageDate , a.ifmmChildrenNum , a.ifmmFavoriteColor , a.ifmmEmailConsentNy , a.ifmmSmsConsentNy , a.ifmmPushConsentNy , a.ifmmDesc , concat("[",b.ifmaZipcode,"] ",b.ifmaAddress1," ",b.ifmaAddress2) as ifmaAddress , b.ifmaZipcode , b.ifmaAddress1 , b.ifmaAddress2 , ifnull((select ifcdName from infrCode where c.ifaoSnsTypeCd = ifcdSeq),"-") as ifmmSns , c.ifaoSnsTypeCd , ifnull(c.ifaoUrl,"-") as ifaoUrl , d.ifmeEmailFull , d.ifmeEmailAccount , d.ifmeEmailDomainCd , (select ifcdName from infrCode where f.ifjqQuestionCd = ifcdSeq) as ifjqQuestion , f.ifjqQuestionCd , f.ifjqAnswer , (select ifcdName from infrCode where h.ifmpTelecomCd = ifcdSeq) as ifmpTelecom , h.ifmpTelecomCd , h.ifmpNumber , concat(substring(h.ifmpNumber,1,3),"-",substring(h.ifmpNumber,4,4),"-",substring(h.ifmpNumber,7,4)) as ifmpNumberDash , substring(h.ifmpNumber,1,3) as ifmpNumber1 , substring(h.ifmpNumber,4,4) as ifmpNumber2 , substring(h.ifmpNumber,7,4) as ifmpNumber3 , (select concat(substring(ifmpNumber,1,2),"-",substring(ifmpNumber,3,3),"-",substring(ifmpNumber,6,4)) from infrmemberphone where ifmpDeviceCd = 24 and ifmpDefaultNy = 1 and ifmmSeq=a.ifmmSeq) as ifmpHomeNumber , substring(i.ifmpNumber,1,2) as ifmpPhone1 , substring(i.ifmpNumber,3,3) as ifmpPhone2 , substring(i.ifmpNumber,6,4) as ifmpPhone3 , (select concat(substring(ifmpNumber,1,3),"-",substring(ifmpNumber,4,3),"-",substring(ifmpNumber,7,4)) from infrmemberphone where ifmpDeviceCd = 26 and ifmpDefaultNy = 1 and ifmmSeq=a.ifmmSeq) as ifmpFaxNumber , substring(j.ifmpNumber,1,3) as ifmpFax1 , substring(j.ifmpNumber,3,3) as ifmpFax2 , substring(j.ifmpNumber,6,4) as ifmpFax3 , (select ifnaName from infrNationality where ifnaSeq = g.ifnaSeq) as ifnaName
from infrMember a left join infrMemberAddress b on b.ifmaDelNy = 0 and b.ifmaDefaultNy = 1 and b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMemberAddressOnline c on c.ifaoDelNy = 0 and c.ifaoDefaultNy = 1 and c.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMembereMail d on d.ifmeDelNy = 0 and d.ifmeDefaultNy = 1 and d.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq -- left join infrMemberHobby e on e.ifmhDelNy = 0 and e.ifmhDefaultNy = 1 and e.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMemberJoinQna f on f.ifjqDelNy = 0 and f.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrMemberNationality g on g.ifmnDefaultNy = 1 and g.ifmnDelNy = 0 and g.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq left join infrmemberphone h on h.ifmpDelNy = 0 and h.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 and h.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq and h.ifmpDeviceCd = 25 and h.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 left join infrmemberphone i on i.ifmpDelNy = 0 and i.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 and i.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq and i.ifmpDeviceCd = 24 and i.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 left join infrmemberphone j on j.ifmpDelNy = 0 and j.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 and j.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq and j.ifmpDeviceCd = 26 and j.ifmpDefaultNy = 1 where 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
SELECT a.ifcdSeq , a.ifcdName , a.ifcdDelNy , a.ifcgSeq FROM rb.infrcode a WHERE 1=1 AND ifcdDelNy = 0 AND ifcdUseNy = 1
SELECT ifmmSeq FROM infrMember WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmId LIKE #{ifmmId}
